1: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>And the word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֵלַ֥י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>came unto me saying</n>
2: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Son</n> אָדָ֕ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> שִׂ֥ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>set</n> פָּנֶ֖יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>thy face</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>toward</n> הָרֵ֣י <sup>2022 </sup> <n>toward the mountains</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <sup>5012 </sup> <n>and prophesy</n> אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n>
3: וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And say</n> הָרֵי֙ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>Ye mountains</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> שִׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hear</n> דְּבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>of the Lord</n> יְהוִ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> כֹּה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְ֠הוִה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> לֶהָרִ֨ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>to the mountains</n> וְלַגְּבָע֜וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>and to the hills</n> לָאֲפִיקִ֣ים <sup>650 </sup> <n>to the rivers</n> [וְלַגֵּאָיֹת כ] (וְלַגֵּאָיֹ֗ות <sup>1516 </sup> <n>valley</n> ק) הִנְנִ֨י <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אֲנִ֜י <sup>589 </sup> <n>Myself</n> מֵבִ֤יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>Behold I [even] I will bring</n> עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> חֶ֔רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>a sword</n> וְאִבַּדְתִּ֖י <sup>6 </sup> <n>upon you and I will destroy</n> בָּמֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>1116 </sup> <n>your high places</n>
4: וְנָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>shall be desolate</n> מִזְבְּח֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>4196 </sup> <n>And your altars</n> וְנִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>shall be broken</n> חַמָּֽנֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>2553 </sup> <n>and your images</n> וְהִפַּלְתִּי֙ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and I will cast down</n> חַלְלֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>2491 </sup> <n>your slain</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>[men] before</n> גִּלּוּלֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>1544 </sup> <n>your idols</n>
5: וְנָתַתִּ֗י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will lay</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פִּגְרֵי֙ <sup>6297 </sup> <n>the dead carcases</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>1544 </sup> <n>their idols</n> וְזֵרִיתִי֙ <sup>2219 </sup> <n>and I will scatter</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַצְמ֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>6106 </sup> <n>your bones</n> סְבִיב֖וֹת <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>your altars</n>
6: בְּכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מוֹשְׁב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>4186 </sup> <n>In all your dwellingplaces</n> הֶעָרִ֣ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the cities</n> תֶּחֱרַ֔בְנָה <sup>2717 </sup> <n>shall be laid waste</n> וְהַבָּמ֖וֹת <sup>1116 </sup> <n>and the high places</n> תִּישָׁ֑מְנָה <sup>3456 </sup> <n>shall be desolate</n> לְמַעַן֩ <sup>4616 </sup> <n>because of</n> יֶחֶרְב֨וּ <sup>2717 </sup> <n>may be laid waste</n> וְיֶאְשְׁמ֜וּ <sup>816 </sup> <n>and made desolate</n> מִזְבְּחֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>4196 </sup> <n>that your altars</n> וְנִשְׁבְּר֤וּ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>may be broken</n> וְנִשְׁבְּתוּ֙ <sup>7673 </sup> <n>and cease</n> גִּלּ֣וּלֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>1544 </sup> <n>and your idols</n> וְנִגְדְּעוּ֙ <sup>1438 </sup> <n>may be cut down</n> חַמָּ֣נֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>2553 </sup> <n>and your images</n> וְנִמְח֖וּ <sup>4229 </sup> <n>may be abolished</n> מַעֲשֵׂיכֶֽם׃ <sup>4639 </sup> <n>and your works</n>
7: וְנָפַ֥ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> חָלָ֖ל <sup>2491 </sup> <n>And the slain</n> בְּתֽוֹכְכֶ֑ם <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>of you and ye shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n>
8: וְהוֹתַרְתִּ֗י <sup>3498 </sup> <n>Yet will I leave a remnant</n> בִּהְי֥וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will have</n> לָכֶ֛ם פְּלִ֥יטֵי <sup>6412 </sup> <n>that ye may have [some] that shall escape</n> חֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>the sword</n> בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the nations</n> בְּהִזָּרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>2219 </sup> <n>when ye shall be scattered</n> בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>through the countries</n>
9: וְזָכְר֨וּ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>of you shall remember</n> פְלִֽיטֵיכֶ֜ם <sup>6412 </sup> <n>And they that escape</n> אוֹתִ֗י <sup>853 </sup> בַּגּוֹיִם֮ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>me among the nations</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to which</n> נִשְׁבּוּ־ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>whither they shall be carried captives</n> שָׁם֒ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>how</n> נִשְׁבַּ֜רְתִּי <sup>7665 </sup> <n>because I am broken</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לִבָּ֣ם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>heart</n> הַזּוֹנֶ֗ה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>with their whorish</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> סָר֙ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>which hath departed</n> מֵֽעָלַ֔י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וְאֵת֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>and by</n> עֵֽינֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>from me and with their eyes</n> הַזֹּנ֕וֹת <sup>2181 </sup> <n>which go a whoring</n> אַחֲרֵ֖י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>1544 </sup> <n>their idols</n> וְנָקֹ֙טּוּ֙ <sup>6962 </sup> <n>and they shall lothe</n> בִּפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>themselves</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>for</n> הָֽרָעוֹת֙ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>for the evils</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשׂ֔וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which they have committed</n> לְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> תּוֹעֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>8441 </sup> <n>in all their abominations</n>
10: וְיָדְע֖וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>And they shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>in</n> חִנָּם֙ <sup>2600 </sup> <n>in vain</n> דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <sup>1696 </sup> <n>[and that] I have not said</n> לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that I would do</n> לָהֶ֖ם הָרָעָ֥ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>this evil</n> הַזֹּֽאת׃ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> פ
11: כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֞ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>GOD</n> הַכֵּ֨ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>Smite</n> בְכַפְּךָ֜ <sup>3709 </sup> <n>with thine hand</n> וּרְקַ֤ע <sup>7554 </sup> <n>and stamp</n> בְּרַגְלְךָ֙ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>with thy foot</n> וֶֽאֱמָר־ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> אָ֔ח <sup>253 </sup> <n>Alas</n> אֶ֛ל <sup>413 </sup> <n>because</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> תּוֹעֲב֥וֹת <sup>8441 </sup> <n>abominations</n> רָע֖וֹת <sup>7451 </sup> <n>for all the evil</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֲשֶׁ֗ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בַּחֶ֛רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> בָּרָעָ֥ב <sup>7458 </sup> <n>by the famine</n> וּבַדֶּ֖בֶר <sup>1698 </sup> <n>and by the pestilence</n> יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>for they shall fall</n>
12: הָרָח֞וֹק <sup>7350 </sup> <n>He that is far off</n> בַּדֶּ֣בֶר <sup>1698 </sup> <n>of the pestilence</n> יָמ֗וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall die</n> וְהַקָּרוֹב֙ <sup>7138 </sup> <n>and he that is near</n> בַּחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> יִפּ֔וֹל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> וְהַנִּשְׁאָר֙ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>and he that remaineth</n> וְהַנָּצ֔וּר <sup>5341 </sup> <n>and is besieged</n> בָּרָעָ֖ב <sup>7458 </sup> <n>by the famine</n> יָמ֑וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall die</n> וְכִלֵּיתִ֥י <sup>3615 </sup> <n>thus will I accomplish</n> חֲמָתִ֖י <sup>2534 </sup> <n>my fury</n> בָּֽם׃
13: וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Then shall ye know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n> בִּֽהְי֣וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> חַלְלֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>2491 </sup> <n>when their slain</n> בְּתוֹךְ֙ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>[men] shall be among</n> גִּלּ֣וּלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>1544 </sup> <n>their idols</n> סְבִיב֖וֹת <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> מִזְבְּחֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>4196 </sup> <n>their altars</n> אֶל֩ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> גִּבְעָ֨ה <sup>1389 </sup> <n>hill</n> רָמָ֜ה <sup>7311 </sup> <n>upon every high</n> בְּכֹ֣ל ׀ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> רָאשֵׁ֣י <sup>7218 </sup> <n>in all the tops</n> הֶהָרִ֗ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of the mountains</n> וְתַ֨חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> עֵ֤ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>tree</n> רַֽעֲנָן֙ <sup>7488 </sup> <n>and under every green</n> וְתַ֙חַת֙ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>and under</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> אֵלָ֣ה <sup>424 </sup> <n>oak</n> עֲבֻתָּ֔ה <sup>5687 </sup> <n>and under every thick</n> מְק֗וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>the place</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>they</n> נָֽתְנוּ־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>where they did offer</n> שָׁם֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> רֵ֣יחַ <sup>7381 </sup> <n>savour</n> נִיחֹ֔חַ <sup>5207 </sup> <n>sweet</n> לְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> גִּלּוּלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>1544 </sup> <n>to all their idols</n>
14: וְנָטִ֤יתִי <sup>5186 </sup> <n>So will I stretch out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָדִי֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>my hand</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וְנָתַתִּ֨י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>upon them and make</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֜רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> שְׁמָמָ֤ה <sup>8077 </sup> <n>desolate</n> וּמְשַׁמָּה֙ <sup>4923 </sup> <n>yea more desolate</n> מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>than the wilderness</n> דִּבְלָ֔תָה <sup>1689 </sup> <n>toward Diblath</n> בְּכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מוֹשְׁבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>4186 </sup> <n>in all their habitations</n> וְיָדְע֖וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and they shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n> פ
